MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the  postcode LL18 and LL22 of Rhyl, Abergele and Bodelwyddan affecting properties in Ffordd Terfyn and surrounding area. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Restoration are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the repairs and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2.32PM on 2nd February 2021
